title: DOOH media meets decentralized tech
description: Utilizing blockchain technology to sell programmatic DOOH advertising isn't new, but existing solutions aren't widely accessible.
solution: We will integrate GOTIGER, our digital signage management platform, with the Cardano ecosystem to enable decentralized DOOH campaigns.
experience: Our tech-savvy, innovative team has provided high-end, interactive DOOH solutions for Times Square billboard owners for over 15 years.
